t: Frndly TV - App on Amazon Appstore

t: Amazon's Fire TV Integrates Frndly TV into Its Live Guide, Enhancing User Experience | Cord Cutters News
s: January 26, 2025 - Amazon Fire TV users can now enjoy seamless access to Frndly TV’s live channels directly from their Fire TV channel guide. This integration, announced recently, brings together the best of both worlds, offering a unified viewing experience for live TV enthusiasts.
